Chunk ZIP
======================================
`czip <https://github.com/DingWB/czip>`_ is a python package for biological data storage and analysis.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

  quick_start
  dnam

Credits and Thanks
========================
The package was provided by Wubin Ding.
